main event: A person walking their dog spotted an unidentified flying object (UFO) over the ocean side of Long Island, New York on December 10, 1957.
interesting points: The observer had seen a similar type of object in the sky 5 days earlier on December 8th at around 11:22 PM EST.
The UFO appeared to be rocket-shaped like a pencil in the front.
The UFO was a bright white color, like the moon, and moved rapidly at a constant track.
The UFO was observed at an elevation of 22 degrees, azimuth 65 degrees west, and was later seen descending at the eastern horizon.
The observation lasted for a fairly short, unestimated amount of time.
location: Ocean side, Long Island, New York
